title: Constant disconnect, no problem with discord
body:
I'm playing with a friend and he constantly disconnect. No problems talking to him on discord, and we tried to reinstall League.
I was wondering if anyone else has this problem or knows how to fix it.

replies.body: Your friend could be having issues specifically reaching our services.  Could be antivirus or firewall blocks, or might need to open a port.  Have him try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help him out.
I don't have a D/C problem but my game lobbies are a nightmare, booted for not picking a champion after all champs are locked in.
